item.title: Online FriCAS Notebooks (ft. Jupyter Notebook)
item.description: 1. Remote Computation Service I selected Ubuntu Debian Linux (Debian 11, the latest Debian Linux supported by the AliYun). The reason for selecting Debian over Ubuntu is the support for FriCAS is only available on Ubuntu 21.4, but Ubuntu 21.4 is not supported by AliYun for now. Here’s the instruction to run jFriCAS on Ubuntu. I’ve changed to AliYun afterwards, he
